pullRequest.bodyText:
…tegration tests work
Thank you for submitting this pull request
JIRA: (please edit the JIRA link if it exists)
link
referenced Pull Requests: (please edit the URLs of referenced pullrequests if they exist)

The below invocation runs kie-osgi/kie-karaf-itests with a version of Fuse 7.8 and related Karaf, CXF and Camel versions. please adjust the paths and versions accordingly.

mvn clean verify -f kie-osgi/kie-karaf-itests -Dkaraf.version=4.2.9.fuse-780021 -Dkie.features.classifier=features-fuse -Dadditional.features.url=mvn:org.jboss.fuse.features/rhba-features/7.8.0.fuse-780036/xml/features -Dkaraf.dist.file=/home/ggrzybek/.m2/repository/org/jboss/fuse/fuse-karaf/7.8.0.fuse-780036/fuse-karaf-7.8.0.fuse-780036.zip -Dkaraf.maven.repos=https://maven.repository.redhat.com/earlyaccess/all@id=early,http://indy.psi.redhat.com/api/group/static@id=indy -Pfuse7 -Dcxf.version=3.3.6.fuse-780027 -Dcamel.version=2.23.2.fuse-780034




a pull request please add comment: Jenkins retest this


a full downstream build please add comment: Jenkins run fdb


a compile downstream build please  add comment: Jenkins run cdb


a full production downstream build please add comment: Jenkins execute product fdb


an upstream build please add comment: Jenkins run upstream

commit.message: [BAPL-1778] Adjust features-fuse.xml to Fuse 7.8 and make sure all integration tests work

nodes.bodyText: I have a question about minimal version. Does it make sense to keep it on 4 if we want to update to Spring 5?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@
 
   <feature name="drools-jpa" version="${project.version}" description="Drools JPA">
     <feature version="${project.version}">drools-module</feature>
-    <feature version="[4,5)">spring-orm</feature>
+    <feature version="[4,6)">spring-orm</feature>

@@ -16,7 +16,7 @@
     - hibernate-dependencies
     - hibernate-validator-dependencies
    These features are contained in some repository not referenced explicitly with <repository> (loose coupling).
-   Fuse 7 specific repository is 'mvn:org.jboss.fuse.features/brms-features/VERSION/xml/features'
+   Fuse 7 specific repository is 'mvn:org.jboss.fuse.features/rhba-features/VERSION/xml/features'
